alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 05 at 11:16PM EDT until September 06 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values in the mid-90s. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough, Merrimack, Sullivan, Cheshire, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will only fall into the upper 60s to low 70s tonight. This will result in very little recovery from hot daytime conditions.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates as this has potential to persist through much of this week.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
